sentences.sentence: The epigraph to O'Rourke's book is from de Quincey's Confessions of an English Opium Eater.
sentences.translation: 奥罗克著作卷首的引语取自德·昆西的《瘾君子自白》。

sentences.sentence: Wait here while I get a closer look at the epigraph on that statue.
sentences.translation: 在这里等一下，我去仔细看看这座雕像上的碑文。

sentences.sentence: You can see the experts' valuable epigraph here; we devote the true scene of the forum to you here!
sentences.translation: 这里，你可以看到专家们的珍贵的题词，这里你可以看到座谈会的真实场面！
